snippet.title: Kill It With Fire 2 - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
More Fire! Bigger Weapons! Larger Levels! Increase Chaos. And yes... more spiders. WAY more spiders! KIWF 2 is an interdimensional action comedy game about murdering spiders. As The Exterminator, you'll travel across the multiverse, utilizing the latest advancements in cutting-edge sci-fi tech to hunt down the arachnid menace once and for all.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
